title: BONUS: A Message from Bobby on Velvet's Edge with Kelly Henderson: Liv Like Riv with Granger Smith and his wife Amber Smith
itunes:title: BONUS: A Message from Bobby on Velvet's Edge with Kelly Henderson: Liv Like Riv with Granger Smith and his wife Amber Smith
description:
Subscribe to Velvet's Edge with Kelly Henderson:

Kelly talks to country music artist, Granger Smith and his wife, Amber about tragically losing their 3 year old son a year ago through and accidental story. The couple bravely tells their story in hopes of educating people on extra safety measures that can be taken to help prevent this from happening. They also share stories of how they are working through their grief and finding joy in each day. 


Donate to help: riverkellyfund.org 


Socials: 

@grangersmith

@amberemilysmith 


Earl Dibbles: Country Boy Quarantine 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
